description:
I developed an app named ‘Missouri River Flood Levels – 2011’. All of the data that feeds this app is from the National Weather Service. When the app is opened you are presented with a list of the seven states that the Missouri River flows through. You click a state and then you are presented with the locations in that state that the National Weather Service has an RSS feed for. For example, there are three locations for Iowa:  Sioux City, Plattsmouth, & La Platte. Now if you tap on Sioux City the data is displayed with:

1.	Alert Stage
2.	Flood Stage
3.	Latest Observation
4.	Observation Time
5.	Highest Forecast
6.	Highest Forecast Time
7.	Last Forecast
8.	Last Forecast Time

I have also added some customizations that allow you to delete states that you are not interested in
